name: Arena: Reloaded
description:
✭✭ Welcome to ARENA: the intergalactic combat league! Customize your combatant and battle your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in blistering virtual reality combat ✭✭

✭ BECOME AN INTERGALACTIC CELEBRITY ✭
Compete for world fame in 200-player online leagues. The action never ends!

✭ AN ARCADE CONSOLE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS ✭
Virtual reality controls and tilt-based cover pull you directly into the action. Don't just play the game...feel the game.

✭ THE GALACTIC OVERLORDS APPROVE ✭
"Spectacular fun, no matter which planet you're playing on" - FreeAppsArcade

✭ JOIN OVER 15 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE ✭
And find out why our apps like Shooting Showdown and Basketball Showdown have lit up the top charts and been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.

INCOMING FEATURE TRANSMISSION
✔ Gyroscope controls let you take aim with your device
✔ Swipe control option for non-gyro devices
✔ Online multiplayer through GameCenter
✔ Join one of four intergalactic Leagues
✔ Unlockable characters and weapons
✔ Customize and upgrade to match your play style
✔ Game Center leaderboards and achievements
✔ Do you even need to hear more? It's a VIRTUAL REALITY online FPS, and it's FREE!
